channel.title: Counter Strike Source Resolution
channel.description: hi, wondering if anyone can help, i recently changed the resolution callibration higher, clicked apply and now ive lost the screen whenever im on it, alt tab back to desktop fine screen re-appears, anyway i can change it back without being in the game? im on a HDTV big one, just to make matters worst. :retard:

item.title: Counter Strike Source Resolution
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
Coolm4n:

Go in your Steam Games Library, right click on Counter-Strike: Source, go to properties and set launch options to “-w [COLOR=‘Red’]x -h [COLOR=‘Green’]y”, where [COLOR=‘Red’]x is your screen’s width resolution and [COLOR=‘Green’]y your screen’s height resolution.

For example, if your resolution is 1280 x 720, then put: “-w 1280 -h 720”.

Ive done it dude, just chucked it back on standard for now, but thanks for the help mate, catch you forums later.
